candidates.title: Barcelona Release v0.1.10
candidates.body:
Added
 - On Solana, the accounts that were passed into the transactions are listed in the `tx.accounts` builtin. There is also a builtin struct `AccountInfo`
 - A new common subexpression elimination pass was added, thanks to [LucasSte](https://github.com/hyperledger-labs/solang/pull/550)
 - A graphviz dot file can be generated from the ast, using `--emit ast-dot`
 - Many improvements to the solidity parser, and the parser has been spun out in it's own create `solang-parser`.
    
Changed
 - Solang now uses LLVM 13.0, based on the [Solana LLVM tree](https://github.com/solana-labs/llvm-project/)
 - The ast datastructure has been simplified.
 - Many bugfixes across the entire tree.

candidates.title: Fancy colored compiler diagnostics using codespan-reporting
Fix invalid llvm IR
candidates.body:
LLVM permits invalid IR in many cases, which llc or llvm-dis does not permit.

Fixes #641

candidates.title: Make solana testsuite work on testnet
feat(parser): DocComments grouping & type annotation
candidates.body:
Resolves https://github.com/hyperledger-labs/solang/issues/620

---

- [x] Differentiate different doc comment styles: line (`/// @author Alexey`) and block (`/** @author Alexey */`)
- [x] Group multiple block doc comments into one introducing `SingleDocComment` that's contained in `DocComment::Block` enum variant
- [x] Preserve newlines in both line and block doc comments, so it would be possible to restore the original formatting of comments

candidates.title: Provide method for accessing accounts on Solana
Make solidity parser a standalone crate
candidates.body:
This is essentially a followup on #597 and makes the solidity parser a standalone crate (`solang-parser`)

## Changes
* move `src/parser/*` to `solang-parser`, including lalrpop build
* move `src/sema/ast/Diagnostic` related structs to `solang-parser/src/diagnostics/`. This was necessary because the parser's error is the Diagnostic, but has the downside that some `Diagnostic` implementation is now in two places:
  * made `src/sema/ast/Diagnostic::formatted_message` a function that accepts a `&Diagnostic` instead
* rm unused dependencies in solang 
* reexport the parser, so it doesn't break

candidates.title: Fix mapping in dynamic array of storage structs
Fix receive and fallback and doccomments at the beginning of the file
Do not link against libffi
candidates.body:
libffi is not needed and we shouldn't depend on it.

Signed-off-by: Sean Young <sean@mess.org>

repo.name: solang
repo.description: A new solidity to wasm compiler written in rust
